title: Create ticket-lifecycle-manager for automated ticket progression

description.summary: Missing agent for automated ticket status management and lifecycle progression. Required for process optimization and systematic ticket management.
description.business_value: Process optimization through automated ticket lifecycle management
description.technical_scope: Develop automation agent for ticket status progression and management

functional: Automate ticket status progression through lifecycle states
Provide systematic ticket updates and notifications
Track ticket metrics and progression analytics
technical: Integration with ticket registry and status tracking

implementation.approach: Deploy automation specialist with lifecycle management capabilities
implementation.architecture: Ticket lifecycle automation with validation framework
implementation.validation: Lifecycle progression testing and status validation

acceptance_criteria: Agent automates ticket lifecycle progression accurately
Integrates with existing ticket management systems
